page.title: 06COUNTRY HOUSE (Cont)
page.content:
The Red Hand Some men were invading an island and theCaptain of the troops said that the first one to touch the shore could have the island so one man cut off his hand and threw it onto the beach and he got the island.
Lamport Hall is very big.It has about 25 rooms I think.The room I liked best was called the Oak room because the walls were panelled with oak carved into squares.They used wood because it made the room warm.It had some muskets in it.They were very heavy guns that soldiers fought with in old battles like the Battle of Naseby.There were pewter plates and big jugs made of leather.
